description:
Straight. 23 years old.
Tan, hairy, lean body.
Very quiet, but blows a nice load!
Gay. 23 years old.
Versatile. Hot, pale, muscular, hairy body. Cute personality!
"I'm more attracted to older guys," he said. "The oldest guy I've been with was 44."
He was a shy teenager and didn't start having sex until later.
"I didn't have sex until I was 22. Had sex with a friend (a girl) and I've been gay ever since!"
Straight. 28 years old. Student.
Smooth body, nice abs!
"I'm going to school for medicine."
Say's he's "100% straight" but added: " I'm very open with everyone I come into contact with."
"Ever been with a guy?"
"I've been in a lot of situations where I've been around guys."
"Ever do anything?"
"Explored some boundaries in my head. It just wasn't for me..."
title: Auditions 33
